docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Introducing P5js
docs.text:
For full documentation visit p5js.org

p5.js is a JavaScript library for creative coding, with a focus on making coding accessible and inclusive for artists, designers, educators, beginners, and anyone else!

docs.title: What is JavaScript?
docs.text:
For full documentation visit Javascript

JavaScript is a programming language that allows you to implement complex functionalities on web pages. It integrates a lot of front-end functionalities (client-side, i.e. how the website looks) but can be also used for back-end when used with a runtime such as Node.js

docs.title: Some Terminology
docs.text: Syntax Description Sketch These are used to refer to quick iterations of small creative coding programs written in P5js. Programming Sketchbook This is a collection of P5js sketches. Just like with a normal sketchbook, the idea is that you work out a variety of different ideas in code and present them as a collection.
